participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, enjoys outdoor activities and music.
participant_1.background: I recently moved to Florida. I only surf when the tide is low. I am a huge fan of Jason Mraz. I want to find out what it's like to eat grasshoppers. Twilight is my favorite book series.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and sociable, loves winter and enjoys sharing experiences.
participant_2.background: My favorite season is winter. My friend once bought me a car. I take vitamin C when I have a cold. I am disabled and cannot walk. I do not eat bread.

content.text: I recently moved to Florida!
That's exciting! What made you decide to move there?
I wanted to be closer to the beach. I love to surf, and I only surf when the tide is low.
That's a great reason! I love the beach too. I'm from California, so I'm used to the warm weather and the ocean.
I'm from California too! I used to live in San Diego.
No way! I used to live in San Diego too! What part of town did you live in?
I lived in La Jolla. What about you?
I lived in Mission Beach.
Oh cool! I know that area.
Me too. I miss San Diego a lot.
Me too. But I'm happy to be in Florida now.
I'm glad you're happy. So, what do you do for fun in Florida?
I like to go to the beach, surf, and go to concerts.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do all of those things too.
I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too. So, what's your favorite band?
I'm a huge fan of Jason Mraz.
I've never heard of him.
He's a really great singer. You should check him out.
I will. I'm always looking for new music to listen to.
I'm glad to hear that.
